text: Jan van Eyck or Johannes de Eyck () (before c. 1395 â€“ before 9 July 1441) was an early Dutch painter active in Bruges. He is thought to be one of the best Northern European painters of the 15th century. He was interested in art since he was a child and was encouraged in this career by his older brother, Hubert. == Other websites == *Web Gallery of Art *Jan van Eyck Gallery at MuseumSyndicate Category:1380s births Category:1441 deaths Category:Dutch painters Category:Dutch diplomats Category:Flemish painters
title: Jan van Eyck
